name: Lost In Debris
description:
A game about a side adventure of a spaceman who has crashlanded on a random planet while on a mission. The cause of his accident is unknown due to the spaceman hitting his head a bit too hard when he crashlanded

This game has been made with a lot of help of ChatGPT. This includes the quest writing and all the icons in the game.

The music you can find here:
https://mayragandra.itch.io/freeemotionalpianomusic

And the the UI sounds you can find here:

https://obsydianx.itch.io/interface-sfx-pack-1

Special thanks BrentBatch,  who helped me through my headaches.
